thread.title: Charli XCX mines ‘Clueless’ for fashion foray
thread.title_full: Charli XCX mines ‘Clueless’ for fashion foray

title: Charli XCX mines ‘Clueless’ for fashion foray
text:
Charli XCX adds fashion designer to her cool school creative belt Melissa Hoyer news.com.au Charli XCX adds fashion designer to her cool school creative belt Melissa Hoyer news.com.au Charli XCX with her onstage pal and fellow girl-with-power Taylor Swift. 
GLOBAL pop star Charli XCX has added fashion designer to her musician bow. 
The cool school British singer has collaborated with global e-tailer boohoo.com to create a collection inspired by her love of the ’90s. 
Echoing classic movie references such as the cutesy kilts of Clueless and gothic drama from 
The Craft , the limited edition range showcases Charli’s trademark sassiness with 
doses of fun and femininity. 
Drawing on her art college experience, Charli pulled together initial mood boards focusing Other Stories
